thread.title: Trump threatens to veto spending bill

title: Trump threatens to veto spending bill
text:
Trump threatens to veto spending bill 3:52pm GMT - 01:38 
On Friday the president threw a wrench into budget negotiations, tweeting his doubts over the $1.3-trillion dollar spending bill which passed through Congress early Friday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
On Friday the president threw a wrench into budget negotiations, tweeting his doubts over the $1.3-trillion dollar spending bill which passed through Congress early Friday.
